resources.string:
This app provide Web Search and many functions.
 
 | Search experience
 1. Favorite search……You could save pair of search site and keyword.
 2. Many search sites.……Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo, Yelp, and so on...
 3. App widget……You could set app-widget on home area or notification area.
 
 | Many functions
 1. Web Search
 2. Barcode Reader
 3. RSS Reader
 4. Simple Tab Browser
 5. Tab Editor
 6. Planning Poker
 7. Screen filter
 8. Music Player
 9. Image Viewer
 10. TODO List
 
 | Customize
 1. Toolbar coloring
 2. Background image
 3. Default search site
 4. Start-up activity
 
 
 Resources
 I have used icons which are owned by "Icon Rainbow (https://icon-rainbow.com/)".
 
 - インターネットでの検索アイコン 1: https://icon-rainbow.com/インターネットでの検索アイコン 1/
 - サイト内検索のアイコン素材: https://icon-rainbow.com/サイト内検索のアイコン素材/
